name: YoYo Train-O
description:
This is just a mini-prototype to test an idea for a mobile application.

Background:All 2D art , 3D art , textures  , animations , sound & music  were done under 36 hours for the Babylon Jam event at Bahçeşehir University Game Lab. The coding was done under 5 days after the event. 

*Currently some videos don't play on the browser.  Download and play YOYOTrainO-standalone_16-9  to see all of the content .*

 Conten:It's an educationl game where you train your pet while learning a new language.  It's aimed at kids but anyone who is willing to learn a new language can enjoy it.

Credits:

3D Models/Textures/Concept :  Ali Engin Kokten

3D Models/3D Animations:  Deniz Ege Tunçay

2D Art/2D Animations/UI Design: Enes Bilgin

Music/Sound Effects: Gözde Berberoğlu Özen

Game Design: Lance G. Powell Jr.

Programming/Unity Development: Mesutcan Göksoy
